data.text: When Alessandro Pastorello was born on 16 May 1881, in Orgiano, Vicenza, Veneto, Italy, his father, Pietro Pastorello, was 27 and his mother, Giuditta Ferrarese, was 27. He married Oriele Maria Giavon on 18 January 1902, in Bento GonÃ§alves, Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil. They were the parents of at least 6 sons and 7 daughters. He died on 12 April 1946, in Pato Branco, ParanÃ¡, Brazil, at the age of 64.
